2xPC KVM Switch Design Files

March 10, 2024

Thank you all for your support- attached are the files for the 2 PC version of Level 1 Tech's KVM Switch for two computers and two DisplayPort monitors per computer. All are designed to be printed flat with no supports, and the photos show Bambu Lab's Dark Grey Carbon Fiber PETG filament. Level1Techs is not a sponsor.

Doscher.com 2PC KVM Bracket for Level1Techs KVM
